channel.title: For guitar-interested ppl
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x4th5ngOX9M
This is the band which mr Floyd Rose himself played in during the 80's. They definately didn't get the recognition they deserved. I'd say they are among the better heavy metal bands from the 80's.
Discuss.
